results.title: Panel beating and paint work
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Panel & paint”.
Provides instructions for the serious amateur panel beater. Introduces the essential tools, rust treatment, paint preparation and minor body repairs. Professional advice and demonstrations are given, leading step by step to the perfect job.

results.title: Finland: a Karelian menu
results.creator_credit: Hal Weiner, Marilyn Weiner and Screenscope Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World of Cooking”.
In Finland, sunlight is at a premium. The precious summer months are a time to celebrate and to harvest the home-grown produce so treasured by the Finns. Master Chef Reijo Rajala insists on using only the freshest ingredients in his cooking. He performs culinary magic with fish, vegetables and pastry dough.

results.title: Specialist panel work
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Panel & paint”.
Provides instructions in advanced panel beating. Lessons include, lead wiping, metal finishing, shrinking, welding and rust removal.

results.title: Brazil: a Bahian Menu
results.creator_credit: Hal Weiner, Marilyn Weiner and Screenscope
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World of Cooking”.
Brazil is a colourful blend of Portuguese, Indian and West African cultures. The modern cooking of the State of Bahia, where African influence predominates, is famous. Chef Roberto Hein shows creative ways to cook fish, chicken, bananas and other foods.

results.title: Spartacus (Bolshoi Ballet) [Widescreen]
results.brief_description: A Bolshoi Ballet performance in two acts of Spartacus by Aram Khachaturyan with choreography by Yuri Grigorovich and featuring dancers Vladimir Vassilyef, Natalya Bessmertnaya, Maris Lieppa, Nina Timofeeva and The Bolshoi Theatre Orchestra and Choir.

results.title: Sparrow
results.creator_credit: Polly Watkins, Trish Carney, Australian Film Commission and In Posse
results.brief_description: A young family lives isolated in rural Australia with the father, a truckie, almost always away. Sparrow asks her mother what the difference is between ghosts and spirits as she ponders the death of the family dog. The mother remains emotionally distant until Sparrow’s curiosity with death leads her to dig up a family secret. ‘Sparrow’ explores the quiet of the emotions within a family and creates a portrait of emotional distance affirmed with the slow pace of country life and the very distant horizon. Cast includes: Molly McCaffrey and Leverne McDonnell.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Polly Watkins, Trish Carney, Australian Film Commission and In Posse

results.title: Cooking of France: an alpine menu
results.creator_credit: Hal Weiner, Marilyn Weiner and Screenscope Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World of Cooking”.
A film which demonstrates that fine French cuisine can be prepared simply, but elegantly, using basic skills and ingredients. Join the amiable Master Chef, Andre Revest, on a tour of his kitchen and his native Dauphiny Alps region.
